title: Meet the {websiteName} Team
subtitle: The innovators behind our open-source archaeological data platform

introduction.title: Who We Are
introduction.description: {websiteName} is driven by a passionate global team of archaeologists, historians, data scientists, and developers. We are united by a commitment to advancing open-access research, preserving cultural heritage, and enabling seamless data management through our browser-based system aligned with CIDOC-CRM and FAIR principles.

members.name: Dr. Elena Martinez
members.bio: Dr. Martinez specializes in Mediterranean archaeology and leads {websiteName}'s efforts to integrate excavation data with CIDOC-CRM standards.

members.name: Prof. Hiroshi Tanaka
members.bio: Prof. Tanaka focuses on East Asian historical records, ensuring {websiteName}'s data is accessible and reusable for global researchers.

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.bio: Sarah designs {websiteName}'s data visualization tools, making complex archaeological datasets intuitive and insightful.

members.name: Luis Navarro
members.bio: Luis oversees {websiteName}'s open-source codebase, ensuring robust performance and security for our browser-based platform.
